summary: Gujarati-only, clean, mobile-friendly small business website for 'Gayatri Ladies Tailor' (ladies tailoring, work-from-home) with Home/About/Services/Contact pages, strict typography/colors, and replaceable AI-illustration placeholders (no real photos).
architectural_notes: Tech stack target: React + Tailwind CSS for a mobile-first static marketing site.
Content constraint: all on-page user-facing text must be Gujarati only (use Gujarati font).
Design constraints: shop name large + dark red; all other text black; background white/light cream; minimal local-business layout.
Media constraint: no real photos/human model images; use AI-generated illustrations/icons or tailoring-themed placeholders; clearly mark all image areas as replaceable.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal elegant sewing machine line illustration on light background (hero-sewing-illustration.dim_1400x800.png)
- Minimal tailoring tools icon set style illustration (about-tailoring-tools.dim_800x600.png)
- Minimal icon: needle and thread (service-icon-needle-thread.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: blouse (service-icon-blouse.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: fancy blouse (service-icon-fancy-blouse.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: chaniya choli/navratri outfit (service-icon-chaniya-choli.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: dress design/sketch (service-icon-dress-design.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: western dress/hanger (service-icon-western-dress.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal icon: custom stitching/tape measure (service-icon-custom-stitching.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal phone/contact icon (contact-phone-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a clean, mobile-friendly multi-page website for the ladies tailoring business using four pages: Home, About Us, Services, and Contact Us.
Use Gujarati-only content for all visible website text (headings, paragraphs, buttons, labels) and apply a Gujarati font across the entire site.

Apply the strict design rules: background must be white or light cream; all normal text color must be black; the shop name “Gayatri Ladies Tailor” must be displayed in a large, elegant dark red style.

Build the Home page with: a hero section containing the shop name (dark red), a sewing/tailoring-themed illustration (not a real photo), a short Gujarati description, clearly shown working time (7:00 AM to 9:00 PM), and a prominent Call Now button that initiates a phone call to 7359316413.

Build the About Us page using the provided business details (Owner: Patel Geetaben J.; Work From Home; ladies tailoring) with Gujarati-only copy and a minimal tailoring tools illustration/icon placeholder labeled as replaceable.

Build the Services page showing each listed service as its own card/row with a simple icon/illustration (no real photos): Normal Blouse, Fancy Blouse, Navratri Special Chaniya Choli, Dress Designing, Western Dress, Custom Ladies Stitching.

Build the Contact Us page displaying mobile number (7359316413), working hours (7:00 AM to 9:00 PM), and a simple Gujarati call-to-action; include a minimal phone/message illustration placeholder labeled as replaceable.

Add a coherent, minimal, local-business-friendly visual theme that stays within the strict rules (light cream/white background, black text, dark red accent) and apply it consistently across all pages (spacing, card style, icon style, typography scale).
Use AI-generated illustrations/icons or fabric/sewing themed placeholder images only; do not use real human model photos; clearly label each image block/section as replaceable for future updates.
Add the generated illustration/image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the relevant sections (hero, about, services icons, contact).

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate the full website implementation (React + Tailwind) using the provided Gujarati content, layout, styling rules, and replaceable illustration/icon placeholders for Gayatri Ladies Tailor.
